answers.answer: Yes im pregnant with baby 2 and they drew blood again this time.
They aren't doing my bloodwork until my second appt. Because my mom has diabetes my doc is going to go ahead and do my 1 hour gtt and bloodwork at my 16 week appt

I had blood work all on my first appointment. It may depend on how soon you come back in. Normal pregnancies usually have longer intervals between appointments versus the high risk that need closer monitoring. Don't be afraid to ask questions or find out when they plan to do bloodwork.Good luck and congratulations

question: When I had my Dr appt. All he did was question about how early I had my daughter, give me an ultrasound and then let me know what we were going to do to keep my little one in as long as possible. No blood work no nothing. With my daughter I had a different Dr and he did my blood and all that. Is it because I'm high risk that he didn't test or what? Did you ladies get blood drawn the first appt?
title: First Dr's appt.
